┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  OPTION 2 : MANUEL (30 secondes)                    │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

   1. Allez sur :
      https://github.com/YousOuazizi/parkshare/settings/actions

   2. Workflow permissions → "Read and write"

   3. Cochez "Allow GitHub Actions to..."

   4. Cliquez "Save"

   ✅ TERMINÉ !
